channel.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
channel.description:
Hi there.
After playing Crysis 2 and loling about how bad it is, I though I would do the first again.
But dear lord its laggy. The 1st part of the game I had decent FPS on very high settings but when it comes to nightime I can't even play in high.
Here is my sys :
e7400 @3ghz GA-31m-es2l 4go ddr pc 6400 HD6950 1go
Is there something wrong with my setup ? Catalyst being crap ?

item.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
my 8800gt and Q6600 (and 4gb of ram etc) run crysis at very high pretty comfortably

okay thats not helping, didnt really read any of the posts;… sorry

Read full topic

item.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
crysis is optimized for nvidia but I have a friend with a 4870 1gb and a 3.0ghz core 2 duo and it runs at 40-60FPS on maximum settings

item.source: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?

item.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
Maybe I’m thinking of something else (quite possible since pretty much everyone above has one and said nothing of issues) but weren’t a lot of people with ATi cards having fps issues with Crysis?

Read full topic
item.source: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?

item.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
While the CPU is probably bottlenecking the GFX card it shouldn’t stop you from running Crysis maxed out at 1920x1080. You probably have a driver issue or something else software-related, or maybe a faulty video card (probably not the latter though)

Read full topic
item.source: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?

item.title: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
Your spec should run it fine on max with no/2xAA. I expect it’s GPU drivers/audio drivers/directx issues. Make sure they are both up to date.

I notice you have overclocked the CPU, knock it back to stock to test. Have you overclocked the 6950? Crysis tended to be sensitive to any kind of overclock.

Are you running the latest patch? The latest is 1.21 but you will probably need to download 1.1 and 1.2 first aswell.

Read full topic
item.source: hd6950 hardly runs crysis on high ?
